displayName: Battery​ level to turn Energy Saver on (PluggedIn)
description:
This policy setting allows you to specify battery charge level at which Energy Saver is turned on when the device is plugged in.​
If you enable this policy setting, you must specify a percentage value that indicates the battery charge level. Energy Saver is automatically turned on at (and below) the specified battery charge level.​
If you disable or do not configure this policy setting, users control this setting.​ (0-100)
